channel.title: grasping on Théo Morales
channel.description: Recent content in grasping on Théo Morales

item.title: A new benchmark for group distribution shifts in hand grasp regression for object manipulation. Can meta-learning raise the bar?
item.description: Computer vision for hand-object pose has real-world potential. We introduce a benchmark for adapting to pose shifts with meta-learning, showing improvements over the baseline.
